bill.title: Electricity; Retail Wheeling
bill.description: Requires the Public Utilities Commission to establish policies and rules for the implementation of retail wheeling. Requires the Commission to report on the status of the implementation of retail wheeling annually until the implementation is complete. (HB2076 HD1)

history.action: Referred to EEP, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 2
Bill scheduled to be heard by EEP on Tuesday, 02-02-16 8:30AM in House conference room 325.

The committees on EEP recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) C. Lee, Lowen, Cullen, Ing, Nishimoto, Yamane, Pouha, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Say; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Evans.
Reported from EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 74-16) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with Representative(s) Har voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Creagan, San Buenaventura, Say excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Wednesday, 02-17-16 9:30AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Woodson, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Hashem, C. Lee, San Buenaventura, Takayama, Fukumoto Chang; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Har; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Kawakami, Nakashima, Oshiro, Yamane, McDermott.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 555-16) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Nakashima, Thielen, Tokioka excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 03-03-16 2:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Cachola, Cullen, DeCoite, Johanson, Jordan, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, LoPresti, Lowen, Onishi, Tokioka, Yamashita, Pouha, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 953-16), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Aquino, Belatti, Cullen, DeCoite, Har, Ito, Kawakami, Keohokalole, McKelvey, Morikawa, Onishi, Oshiro, San Buenaventura, Souki, Tokioka, Yamane voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Say voting no (1) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
